t: “The*pn Spirit of the Lord God*s is*i upon Me, Because*ld the Lord*s has anointed Me To*ld preach good tidings to the poor; He*ld has sent Me to heal the brokenhearted, To*ld proclaim liberty to the captives, And*ld the opening of the prison to those*i who*i are*i bound;
To*ld proclaim the acceptable year of the Lord,*s And*ld the day of vengeance of our God; To*ld comfort all who mourn,

To*ld console those who mourn in Zion, To*ld give them beauty for ashes, The*ld oil of joy for mourning, The*ld garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness; That*ld they may be called trees of righteousness, The*ld planting of the Lord,*s that He may be glorified.”
And*ln they shall rebuild the old ruins, They*ld shall raise up the former desolations, And*ld they shall repair the ruined cities, The*ld desolations of many generations.
Strangers*ld shall stand and feed your flocks, And*ld the sons of the foreigner Shall*ild be*i your plowmen and your vinedressers.
But*ld you shall be named the priests of the Lord,*s They*ld shall call you the servants of our God. You*ld shall eat the riches of the Gentiles, And*ld in their glory you shall boast.

Instead*ld of your shame you*i shall*i have*i double honor,*i And*ld instead*i of*i confusion they shall rejoice in their portion. Therefore*ld in their land they shall possess double; Everlasting*ld joy shall be theirs.
“For*ln I, the Lord,*s love justice; I*ld hate robbery for burnt offering; I*ld will direct their work in truth, And*ld will make with them an everlasting covenant.

Their*ld descendants shall be known among the Gentiles, And*ld their offspring among the people. All*ld who see them shall acknowledge them, That*ld they are*i the posterity whom*i the Lord*s has blessed.”

I*ln will greatly rejoice in the Lord,*s My*ld soul shall be joyful in my God; For*ld He has clothed me with the garments of salvation, He*ld has covered me with the robe of righteousness, As*ld a bridegroom decks himself*i with ornaments, And*ld as a bride adorns herself*i with her jewels.

For*ld as the earth brings forth its bud, As*ld the garden causes the things that are sown in it to spring forth, So*ld the Lord God*s will cause righteousness and praise to spring forth before all the nations.
